Defining URLhttp://fhir.health.gov.il/NamingSystem/il-national-id
Version4.1.0
NameIsraeli National Identifier - Individual
Statusactive
Definition

Israeli Identifier number issued for all citizens and permanent residents. A nine-digit number including a check-digit

PublisherIsraeli Ministry of Health

name: Israeli National Identifier - Individual
description: Israeli Identifier number issued for all citizens and permanent residents. A nine-digit number including a check-digit
usage: Used in Israel for identifying patients, practitioners and relatedPersons

uniqueId.comment: This value was mistakenly set in the first drafts of ILCore
